actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-369.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 51, a bill to amend the Natural Gas Pipeline Safety Act of 1968 to provide for the safe operation of pipelines transporting natural gas and liquefied petroleum gas, to provide standards with respect to the siting, construction, and operation of liquefied natural gas facilities, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 51 (Natural gas safety).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 51, a bill to amend the Natural Gas Pipeline Safety Act of 1968 to provide for the safe operation of pipelines transporting natural gas and liquefied petroleum gas, to provide standards with respect to the siting, construction, and operation of liquefied natural gas facilities, and for other purposes.
